title: Airline Typeface Help!
content:
Hi,   
I am looking to create a ficticious airline called "DebonAir" - which has a strong reference to the 60s air travel aesthetic (Pan Am etc). I was hoping for some suggestions for a typeface to base a logotype from. My main goal is to create something that hints of that era, whilst still maintaining a contemporary edge.   
I understand the highly subjective nature of my request, but some stepping stones to get me on my way would be \*greatly\* appreciated.   
   
Thanks in advance!
author: pbags

comments.content: Paul, try a Google search for Airline Logos 60s and see what you come up with. I hope this helps
